description_short: Biodegradable paper straws in multiple sizes and colours for eco-friendly service.
description_standard: Classic paper drinking straws offering a sustainable plastic-free solution. Available in black, white, and striped designs across standard and jumbo sizes. Fully biodegradable and recyclable.
description_detailed: Our paper straws provide the go-to eco-friendly alternative to plastic straws. Made from FSC-certified paper with a food-safe coating, they stay firm for everyday use while remaining fully biodegradable. Choose from classic white for a clean look, sophisticated black for upscale service, or red-white stripes for a fun retro vibe. Available in 6mm standard width for soft drinks and 8mm jumbo width for thicker beverages. Ideal for cafes, restaurants, bars, and event catering. Bulk wholesale pricing available.
meta_title: Paper Straws | Biodegradable | Bulk Wholesale | Afida
meta_description: Paper straws in black, white, and striped designs. Biodegradable, plastic-free, FSC-certified. Bulk wholesale pricing. Free UK delivery £100+.

description_short: Compostable straws in bamboo and bio fibre — eco-friendly plastic alternatives.
description_standard: Biodegradable drinking straws made from natural bamboo pulp and bio fibre. Stronger than paper straws and fully compostable. Available in multiple sizes for smoothies, cocktails, and cold drinks.
description_detailed: Our biodegradable straws offer a sustainable alternative to single-use plastic. Choose from bamboo pulp straws with natural rigidity or bio fibre straws for a smooth finish. Both materials are 100% compostable and break down naturally without leaving microplastics. Unlike paper straws, these hold their shape in cold drinks without going soggy. Ideal for cafes, bars, smoothie shops, and catering events where eco credentials matter. Available in standard and jumbo widths to suit different beverages.
meta_description: Biodegradable straws in bamboo and bio fibre. Compostable, plastic-free, stronger than paper. Bulk wholesale pricing. Free UK delivery £100+.

description_short: Disposable paper napkins in dispenser, cocktail, and dinner sizes for catering.
description_standard: Quality paper napkins for every foodservice setting. Choose from dispenser napkins for high-traffic venues, cocktail napkins for bars and events, or premium airlaid dinner napkins with a cloth-like feel.
description_detailed: Our paper napkin range covers every catering need. Dispenser napkins offer practical 1-ply economy for cafes and quick-service restaurants. Cocktail napkins in airlaid and standard paper suit bars, coffee shops, and event catering. Premium dinner napkins feature luxurious airlaid construction with an elegant cloth-like texture for fine dining and upscale events. Available in black and white across all sizes. Also available in eco-friendly bamboo pulp. Bulk wholesale pricing for restaurants, hotels, and catering companies.
meta_title: Paper Napkins | Dispenser Cocktail & Dinner | Afida
meta_description: Paper napkins for catering: dispenser, cocktail, and airlaid dinner napkins. Black and white options. Bulk wholesale pricing. Free UK delivery £100+.

description_short: Disposable wooden forks, knives, spoons, and cutlery kits for eco-friendly catering.
description_standard: Sustainable wooden cutlery for eco-conscious catering. Choose from forks, knives, spoons, or complete cutlery kits. Made from natural birchwood, fully biodegradable and compostable.
description_detailed: Our wooden cutlery range offers a premium sustainable alternative to plastic disposables. Made from natural birchwood, each piece is smooth, sturdy, and splinter-free. Forks and knives handle everything from salads to main courses, while spoons are perfect for soups, desserts, and yoghurt pots. Cutlery kits bundle fork, knife, spoon, and napkin for convenient meal service. All items are 100% biodegradable and commercially compostable. Ideal for food trucks, outdoor events, workplace canteens, and eco-conscious catering. Bulk wholesale pricing available.
meta_title: Wooden Cutlery | Forks Knives & Spoons | Afida
meta_description: Wooden cutlery: forks, knives, spoons, and kits. Biodegradable birchwood, plastic-free. Bulk wholesale pricing. Free UK delivery £100+.
